post.description: Triggered when a data connection status of a specific company changes.

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the webhook was received successfully.

post.description: Triggered when initial syncs are complete for all data types queued for a newly connected company, and at least one of those syncs is successful.

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the webhook was received successfully.

post.description: Generated for each data type to indicate that data synchronization is successfully completed for that specific data type.

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the webhook was received successfully.

post.description: Generated for each data type to indicate that dataset synchronization has completed and updated Codat's data cache through the creation of new records or a change to existing records.

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the webhook was received successfully.

post.description: Indicates that the synchronization of a dataset failed.

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the webhook was received successfully.

post.description: Indicates that a create, update, or delete operation's status has changed.

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the webhook was received successfully.

post.description: Indicates that a create, update, or delete operation has timed out.

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the webhook was received successfully.

post.description: Triggered anytime a company's accounts are categorized. This can be when Codat updates the suggested category fields or a user updates the confirmed category fields.

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the webhook was received successfully.

post.description: Indicates a Sync for Commerce connection has been deleted. Used for Sync for Commerce only.

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the webhook was received successfully.

post.description: Triggered anytime an expense sync completes without failures. Used for Sync for Expenses only.

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the webhook was received successfully.

post.description: Indicates a failure occurred during an expense sync. Used for Sync for Expenses only.

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the webhook was received successfully.

post.description: Triggered when the number of requests to Codat's API from the client exceeds the current quota.

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the webhook was received successfully.

post.description: Triggered when the rate limit quota has reset for the client, and more requests to Codat's API are available.

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the webhook was received successfully.

AccountCategoriesUpdatedWebhook.title: Account categories updated webhook
AccountCategoriesUpdatedWebhook.description: Webhook request body for the "Account categories updated" event.

modifiedDate.description: The date on which the company's account categories were last modified in Codat.
modifiedDate.title: Date

examples.Message: Account categories updated for company f1c35bdc-1546-41b9-baf4-3f31135af968.

ClientRateLimitReachedWebhook.title: Client rate limit reached webhook
ClientRateLimitReachedWebhook.description: Webhook request body for a client that has reached their rate limit.

ClientRateLimitReachedWebhookData.title: Client rate limit reached webhook data

DailyQuota.description: The number of available requests per day.

ExpiresUtc.description: The date time in UTC when your daily quota is reset.
ExpiresUtc.title: Date time

examples.Message: The current daily rate limit quota of 1000 requests for bae71d36-ff47-420a-b4a6-f8c9ddf41140 has been reached.

ClientRateLimitResetWebhook.title: Client rate limit reset webhook
ClientRateLimitResetWebhook.description: Webhook request body for a client that has had their rate limit reset.

ClientRateLimitResetWebhookData.title: Client rate limit reset webhook data

QuotaRemaining.description: Total number of requests remaining for your client.

ResetReason.description: The reason for your rate limit quota being reset.

examples.Message: The current daily rate limit quota for client 30e0f9d2-52c0-4c9f-a806-bcd98a3bcd7e has been reset to 1000 requests.

Data.ResetReason: The quota was reset because it is a new day.

ConnectionStatusChangedWebhook.title: Connection status changed webhook
ConnectionStatusChangedWebhook.description: Webhook request body for a company's data connection status changed.

newStatus.description: The new authorization status of the data connection.
newStatus.title: Data connection status

oldStatus.description: The old authorization status of the data connection.

platformKey.description: A unique 4-letter key to represent a platform in each integration. View [accounting](https://docs.codat.io/integrations/accounting/overview#platform-keys), [banking](https://docs.codat.io/integrations/banking/overview#platform-keys), and [commerce](https://docs.codat.io/integrations/commerce/overview#platform-keys) platform keys.

examples.Message: Data connection for SandBox status changed from PendingAuth to Linked

DatasetDataChangedWebhook.title: Dataset data changed webhook
DatasetDataChangedWebhook.description: Webhook request body to notify that a data synchronization has completed.

examples.Message: Data has changed for dataset type invoices, company 8a210b68-6988-11ed-a1eb-0242ac120002

DatasetStatusChangedErrorWebhook.title: Dataset status changed to error webhook
DatasetStatusChangedErrorWebhook.description: Webhook request body to notify that a data synchronization has completed.

DatasetStatusChangedErrorWebhookData.title: Dataset status changed to error webhook data

datasetStatus.description: The current status of the dataset's sync.

datasetId.description: Unique identifier for the dataset that completed its sync.

examples.RuleType: Data Sync Status Changed To Error
examples.Message: ERROR: syncing payments triggered a ProcessingError notification at 2020-04-21T12:12:57.4250446Z.

DataSyncCompletedWebhook.title: Data sync completed webhook
DataSyncCompletedWebhook.description: Webhook request body to notify the completion of a data sync.

DataConnectionId.description: Unique identifier for a company's data connection.

examples.Message: Data sync of type creditNotes completed for company 7626befb-0c7d-49a4-9366-bc4c81b4e4b7

NewCompanySynchronizedWebhook.title: New company synchronized webhook
NewCompanySynchronizedWebhook.description: Webhook request body to notify that a new company has successfully synchronized at least one dataType for the first time.

companyName.description: Name of company whose connection has changed.

sourceType.title: Source Type
sourceType.description: The type of platform of the connection.

examples.Message: Company 8a210b68-6988-11ed-a1eb-0242ac120002 synced for the first time

PushOperationStatusChangedWebhook.title: Push operation status changed webhook
PushOperationStatusChangedWebhook.description: Webhook request body for a push operation status change.

PushOperationStatusChangedWebhookData.title: Push operation status changed webhook data

status.title: Push operation status
status.description: The current status of the push operation.

pushOperationKey.description: A unique identifier generated by Codat to represent this single push operation. This identifier can be used to track the status of the push, and should be persisted.

examples.Message: invoices triggered notification for PushOperationStatusChanged at 2019-05-22T18:19:42.742Z

PushOperationTimedOutWebhook.title: Push operation timed out webhook
PushOperationTimedOutWebhook.description: Webhook request body notifying that a push push operation has timed out.

PushOperationTimedOutWebhookData.title: Push operation timed out webhook data

examples.Message: ERROR: pushing invoices never finished in time, timing out at 2020-09-07T08:42:13

SyncCompleteWebhook.title: Sync complete webhook
SyncCompleteWebhook.description: Webhook request body used to notify that a sync has completed.

examples.Message: Sync 321363b4-efa9-4fbc-b71c-0b58d62f3248 for company 1f9559e7-8368-48c9-bdf4-f158e16b8b85 of type Expense completed successfully.

SyncConnectionDeletedWebhook.title: Sync connection deleted webhook
SyncConnectionDeletedWebhook.description: A Sync for Commerce connection is deleted.

examples.Message: Sync connection for company Tesco (8a210b68-6988-11ed-a1eb-0242ac120002) deleted

SyncFailedWebhook.title: Sync failed webhook
SyncFailedWebhook.description: Webhook request body used to notify that a sync has failed.

ClientId.title: Client ID
ClientId.description: Unique identifier for your client in Codat.

ClientName.description: Name of your client in Codat.

CompanyId.description: Unique identifier for your SMB in Codat.

AlertId.description: Unique identifier of the webhook event.

Message.description: A human-readable message about the webhook.

syncId.description: Unique identifier for the failed sync.

syncType.description: The type of sync being performed.

FailureStage.description: The stage of the job the sync failed.

examples.Message: Sync 3bead2a1-1b3d-4d90-8077-cddc5ca68b01 for company 1f9559e7-8368-48c9-bdf4-f158e16b8b85 of type Expense has failed at step Pushing.

SyncStartedWebhook.title: Sync started webhook
SyncStartedWebhook.description: Webhook request body used to notify that a sync has started.

examples.Message: Sync 321363b4-efa9-4fbc-b71c-0b58d62f3248 for company 1f9559e7-8368-48c9-bdf4-f158e16b8b85 of type Expense has started.

auth_header.name: Authorization
auth_header.description: The word "Basic" followed by a space and your API key. [API keys](https://docs.codat.io/accounting-api#/schemas/apiKeys) are tokens used to control access to the API. You can get an API key via [the Codat Portal](https://app.codat.io/developers/api-keys), via [the API](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/api-keys/api-keys-list), or [read more](https://docs.codat.io/using-the-api/authentication) about authentication at Codat.
